name: Spectrum Shooter 2
description:
A colorful arcade shooter where you need to match the color of your bullets to that of your enemies!

Controls: MouseAimLeft ClickShootA & DRotate Color Wheel
SpaceChromasplosion

This game contains brightly flashing colors, which may cause seizures in players with photosensitive epilepsy. These can be limited in the options menu, but please be safe.

Based on The Original by Zachary Thompson (name/concept used with permission).

Music by Kaz (also used with permission).
